synthesis_conditions.solvent_amounts: 2 ml of [Ru2(F3PhCO2)4(THF)2] solution, 1 ml of DCM/p-xylene buffer layer, 20 ml of TCNQ(OEt)2 in p-xylene
synthesis_conditions.equipment: narrow-diameter glass tubes (inner diameter of 8 mm)
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: All synthetic procedures were performed under an inert atmosphere using standard Schlenk-line techniques and a commercial glove box. Solvents were distilled under N2 using common drying agents.

synthesis_conditions.yield: Elemental analysis (%): calculated for C72H28F24N4O18Ru4, C (41.23), H (1.35), N (2.67). Found: C (41.64), H (1.44), N (2.72).
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: Crystallization solvents in 1-DCM were easily eliminated when the crystals were exposed only to air.
Isostructural with 1-DCM, considered as a pseudopolymorph where DCM molecules in 1-DCM replaced by four molar amounts of CO2 molecules.
Accommodates further CO2 molecules in the void space newly produced between the layers by the structural transition.
